favourite.article: Verse three says so much. I live; not I; tis He alone by who the mighty work is done. Just like it says in John 15, "Apart from Me you can do nothing." I struggle to remember this precious truth.
1 John 3:6 Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not. We keep sin out of our lives, by abiding in HIM every moment of the day. He abides in us and we in Him.

John chapter 5 says that He is the vine and we are the branches. One thing the Lord encourages us is only to abide in Him. Abiding in Him is so wondrous thing and the sweeties thing at all. So, please take to listen this hymn it is so wonderful song. HALLELUJAH!
